commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic create
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic create --name
                                    --namespace-name
                                    --resource-group
                                    [--event-retention-in-days]
                                    [--input-schema {CloudEventSchemaV1_0}]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--publisher-type {Custom}]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic create -g rg -n topic --namespace-name name --event-retention-in-days 1 --publisher-type custom

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic delete
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic delete [--ids]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--namespace-name]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--subscription]
                                    [--yes]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic delete -g rg -n topic --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic list
commands.summary: List all the namespace topics under a namespace.
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic list -g rg --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic list-key
commands.summary: List the two keys used to publish to a namespace topic.
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic list-key -g rg --topic-name topic --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic regenerate-key
commands.summary: Regenerate a shared access key for a namespace topic.
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic regenerate-key --key-name
                                            [--ids]
                                            [--namespace-name]
                                            [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                            [--resource-group]
                                            [--subscription]
                                            [--topic-name]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic regenerate-key -g rg --topic-name topic --namespace-name name --key-name key1

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic show
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic show -g rg -n topic --namespace-name name

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic update
commands.syntax:
az eventgrid namespace topic update [--add]
                                    [--event-retention-in-days]
                                    [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--ids]
                                    [--input-schema {CloudEventSchemaV1_0}]
                                    [--name]
                                    [--namespace-name]
                                    [--no-wait {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                    [--publisher-type {Custom}]
                                    [--remove]
                                    [--resource-group]
                                    [--set]
                                    [--subscription]
examples: az eventgrid namespace topic create -g rg -n topic --namespace-name name --input-schema CloudEventSchemaV1_0

commands.name: az eventgrid namespace topic wait
commands.summary: Place the CLI in a waiting state until a condition is met.
